default.value: PropertyPanel component created with responsive layout, collapsible sections, form controls for text/style/position/size properties, and TypeScript interfaces. Ready for integration with App.tsx and useCanvasState.

Component Architecture Lead completed comprehensive property panel architecture design. Created detailed documentation with component hierarchy, TypeScript interfaces, state management patterns, responsive layout system, and 6-phase implementation plan. Architecture integrates seamlessly with existing useCanvasState hook and command system.

PropertyPanel development completed successfully. Created responsive component with collapsible sections, integrated with App.tsx layout, connected to useCanvasState for element data management. Component supports text, style, position, and size property editing with multi-element selection support. All TypeScript interfaces defined and form controls implemented.

Created files: src/components/PropertyPanel/PropertyPanel.tsx (main component), src/components/PropertyPanel/PropertyPanel.css (styling), src/components/PropertyPanel/index.ts (exports), src/utils/diagramFactory.ts (diagram creation utility). Updated App.tsx to integrate PropertyPanel with useCanvasState hook.
